name: reticulum-zig
description: An implementation of Reticulum for operating systems and embedded devices
readme:
# Overview

An implementation of [Reticulum](https://github.com/markqvist/Reticulum) in [Zig](https://ziglang.org/) targeting operating systems and embedded devices.

# Licence

- Currently under Apache 2.0 and MIT for now; if I move over to the Reticulum licence at some point, it will only be after significant thought and consideration.
